data.text: @azdemparty @POTUS Huh? Y'all are absolutely delusion......I don't think we watched the same speech........
@azdemparty @POTUS According to your poll maybe. Every other poll in America shows @POTUS is a terrible president. https://t.co/GTXhhljplg

@azdemparty @POTUS Please do more of these (speeches) @POTUS. People need to hear from you directly and (like President Zelensky) we are motivated by the truth. We need to hear it more from you to counter the lies from Fox!

cc @PressSec @WHCOS
